allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: use ephemeral port for dev server to avoid Hyper-V conflicts

Port 7777 falls within Windows'' excluded port range \(7747-7846\) reserved
by Hyper-V/WSL2/Docker, causing "os error 10013" on many Windows machines.
Now lets the OS pick an available port automatically.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
